      • Tile

        public Tile(int x,
            int y,
            int width,
            int height,
            int tileX,
            int tileY)
        Parameters:
        x - - the x position
        y - - the y position
        width - - the width of the tile
        height - - the height of the tile
        tileX - - the x coordinate representation of the tile in the tilesystem
        tileY - - the y coordinate representation of the tile in the tilesystem
